header.title: snmpa_supervisor

erlref.modulesummary: A supervisor for the SNMP agent Processes

description.p: This is the top supervisor for the agent part of the SNMP application. There is always one supervisor at each node with an SNMP agent (master agent or sub-agent).

func.name: start_sub_sup(Opts) -> {ok, pid()} | {error, {already_started, pid()}} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Start the SNMP supervisor for sub-agents only

desc.p: Starts a supervisor for the SNMP agent system without a master agent. The supervisor starts all involved SNMP processes, but no agent processes. Sub-agents should be started by calling start_sub_agent/3.
See configuration parameters for a description of the options.

func.name: start_master_sup(Opts) -> {ok, pid()} | {error, {already_started, pid()}} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Start the SNMP supervisor for all agents

desc.p: Starts a supervisor for the SNMP agent system. The supervisor starts all involved SNMP processes, including the master agent. Sub-agents should be started by calling start_subagent/3.
See snmp config for a description of the options.
Starts a sub-agent on the node where the function is called. The snmpa_supervisor must be running.
If the supervisor is not running, the function fails with the reason badarg.
Stops the sub-agent on the node where the function is called. The snmpa_supervisor must be running.
If the supervisor is not running, the function fails with the reason badarg.
